title: moving champion portraits
body: any idea when they are coming out? ive been looking forward to them for a long time. im sure others have as well

replies.body: woohoo lets dota-ify the game even more!
When people who run the game under 60FPS leave and get better PCs we may get nice things.
they come out on the log in screen for new champions, i really doubt they would put that in game
